entry.title: 【BL ASMR】 つよ×2淫魔くんわからせちゃんねるっ!古参ファンの取締官と公開発情配信H
entry.content:
Information

Title : つよ×2淫魔くんわからせちゃんねるっ!古参ファンの取締官と公開発情配信H
Developer : cyan
Character Voice: 谷根千
Format: wav

Description

配信で人間をヤりたい放題しているつよつよ淫魔くんアル(24)。
ある日、突然やって来た古参ファンの魔族取締官、リスナーネーム「センセイ」にチャンネルを
乗っ取られてしまった。
イキるアルに課せられた刑は、「反省するまでカメラの前で公開わからせH配信」!?
リスナーのリクエストに答えたり、凸待ちでリスナー(モブ)達にヤられたり、そして、ついに「センセイ」と……!?
つよ×2淫魔くんわからせちゃんねるっ、配信スタート!

entry.title: 【BL ASMR】 ノンケ非処女リーマン小谷さん(27歳、縦割れ) 念願の本物チンポでオホイキからの恋愛ってアリ!?
entry.content:
Information

Title : ノンケ非処女リーマン小谷さん(27歳、縦割れ) 念願の本物チンポでオホイキからの恋愛ってアリ!?
Developer : somnium
Character Voice: 麻生修也
Format: wav

Description

ある日、居酒屋に集まった男女10人。
各々会話に花が咲いているものの、約2名……何も縁が出来ないことが逆に面白くなって意気投合。
二人は結局2軒目へ行ってそのまま終電を逃しラブホテルで三次会をすることに。
しかしそこで誠吾性癖を暴露し始めているうちに、誠吾がとんでもない性癖を元彼女に植え付けられてしまっていたことが発覚する。
そしてその晩……何故か二人はセックスをすることになってしまい……!?

entry.title: 【Tutorial】 How to extract, edit, and re-insert AST engine scripts for translations (Nessa no Rakuen)
entry.content:
Tools

  1. GARBRO

  2. SExtractor

  3. arc_conv

Extracting the script files (.adv) from dat01

Use GARbro to extract the .adv files from dat01

Using SExtractor to extract and re-insert the script

Open 运行.bat, choose the directory where the extracted .adv is located, and put the engine to “BIN”. extractformat and extractmode can be anything, but I suggest going with JSON {name, msgRN} or xlsx and multifile. Click “choose regex” and choose “AST”.

There should be a new folder called “orig” that contains the original script put into JSON files, copy all of these to the “trans” folder and translate the files there. To reinsert them back into .adv files, run SExtractor again with the same settings as before and click “extract/import.” It should automatically detect the files in “trans” and output them to the “new” folder.

Repacking dat01

Put the folder containing your edited .adv files inside the arc_conv directory. Then, in the directory address bar, type “cmd,” press Enter, then type:

entry.title: 【Tutorial】 How to extract, edit, and re-insert DDSystem scripts for translations (Shingakkou -Noli me tangere-, Haiiro no Arcadia, Dystopia no ou, Pigeon Blood)
entry.content:
Tools

  1. DDWSystemTool

Extracting _text.dat

Put the _text.dat file inside the DDWSystemTool folder directory, open PowerShell and type “cmd”, press Enter.

To extract _text.dat, do:

This will create a new folder containing .hxb files.

Extracting script text from .hxb

To extract the script text from the .hxb files, do:

Details about the extracted script text format

The extracted script format is in “double line” or “two-line” format. Meaning, you should only put your translations on the “◆” tag.


This should be obvious, but don’t modify the line-breaks (\n) that’s at the start of narration or dialogue.

Other than that, you can force a line-break as you please with (\n).

Rebuilding the script

Make sure the .hxb files and text files are in the same folder.

To re-insert the edited text files back into .hxb files do:

This will create a new folder called “rebuild” with your rebuilt .hxb files with it’s text replaced.

Repacking _text.dat

To repack _text.dat do:


If you’re asking, “How do I know it’s DDP2 or DPP3?” Pretty easy; if you got the wrong one, an error message will appear at the start. But all visual novels I’ve tested personally used DPP3.

Examples

Haiiro no Arcadia, Gray Arcadia, 灰色のアルカディア

Dystopia no ou, King of Dystopia, ディストピアの王

Shingakkou noli me tangere, Theological Seminary, 神学校-Noli me tangere-

entry.title: 【Tutorial】 How to extract, edit, and re-insert Emon engine scripts for translations (Ego to Koukai no Dilemma)
entry.content:
Tools

  1. GARBRO

  2. SExtractor

Extracting EDscene.eme

Use GARbro to extract the .txt files from EDscene.eme , it’s located in the Data folder.

Using SExtractor to extract and re-insert the script

Open 运行.bat, choose the directory where the extracted .txt is located, and put the engine to “BIN”. Extractformat and extractmode can be anything, but I suggest going with JSON {name, msgRN} or xlsx and multifile. Click “choose regex” and choose “__Custom0” and paste:


There should be a new folder called “orig” that contains the original script put into JSON files, copy all of these to the “trans” folder and edit the files there. To reinsert them back into .txt files, run SExtractor again with the same settings as before and click “extract/import.” It should automatically detect the files in “trans” and output them to the “new” folder.

Repacking EDscene.eme

To repack EDscene.eme with your edited .txt files, go to your SExtractor directory and go to the folder tools > EmonEngine. Create a folder with your edited .txt files inside and place the original EDscene.eme file OUTSIDE the folder containing the .txt files.

Afterwards, open Command Prompt and type:

entry.title: 【Tutorial】 How to extract, edit, and re-insert GameSystem" engine scripts for translations (Artificial Mermaid -Silver Chaos II-, Hanamachi Monogatari)
entry.content:
Tools

  1. arc_conv

Unpacking .cmp

Run build.bat to create the arc_conv.exe file in the “arc_conv” folder then open arc_conv.exe to extract the SCRIPT.cmp file. The scripts are simple XML files.

Repacking .cmp

Put the folder containing your edited XML files inside the arc_conv.exe directory then open cmd and type:

entry.title: 【Tutorial】 How to extract, edit, and re-insert Nscripter scripts for translations (Kurai Nichiyoubi - Sombre Dimanche, Umiiro Kyoushikyoku -Umiiro Rhapsody-)
entry.content:
Tools

  1. NScripter Translation Utilities

  2. ONScripter

Unpacking nscript.dat

Put nscript.dat into the nsdec.exe directory and double click nsdec.exe, you will get a text file called “result.txt” containing the script and commands.

Repacking nscript.dat

Put the edited result.txt file into the nscmake.exe directory and open command prompt, type in the command:

Onscripter

Use ONscripter to address the text issues (such as half-width characters) that comes with translating Japanese Nscripter visual novels. All usage instructions are in it’s github README. (I felt lazy and didn’t want to explain it here)

entry.title: 【Tutorial】 How to extract, edit, and re-insert YU-RIS engine scripts for translations (Narisokonai no Yosuga)
entry.content:
Tools

  1. GARBRO

  2. VNTextPatch

  3. BREYURIS

Unpacking ysbin.ypf

Unpack using GARBro, select the “Try to guess” encryption and extract the ysbin folder with the .ybn files inside.

Extracting text from the .ybn file

Open powershell in the VNTextPatch’s directory and type “cmd”, press Enter, and then type:

Reinserting the text back into .ybn

Open powershell in the VNTextPatch’s directory and type “cmd”, press Enter, and then type:

Repacking ysbin.ypf

Keep in mind the folder structure should be ysbin > ysbin > (the .ybn files)

Put the original ysbin.ypf file and the folder containing your edited .ybn files (which needs to be called ysbin) inside the BREYURIS directory then open BREYURIS.exe. Type in “ysbin.ypf” in “YPF name” then click “YPF info”.


Type “ysbin” in “YBN’s Folder Name” after receiving the version, then click “YPF Archive”.

entry.title: 【BL Game】 Haiiro no Arcadia/Gray Arcadia
entry.content:
Information

Title : 灰色のアルカディア/Haiiro no Arcadia/Gray Arcadia
Developer : Peaky
Play time: Long
VNDB: v37469
Engine: DDsystem

Description

The story focuses on protagonist Tamaki, who’s a transfer student at an all-boys boarding school. This school is not just any boarding school and most of the students are children of elites, such as business leaders and managers of big companies. Located on top of a mountain surrounded by nature, it was built based on the idea of ‘’creating the best environment in which students can focus on studying’’.

Due to the education policy that prioritizes studying, any form of entertainment is strictly prohibited. Game consoles, televisions, music players and mobile phones cannot be used inside the school. Going outside is also forbidden and even going home during the summer vacation is not allowed.

Tamaki becomes friends with three students, however their behavior makes him uncomfortable.

‘’Who really is ‘honest’?’’
‘’There is something strange about this school’’

entry.title: 【Tutorial】 How to extract, edit, and re-insert Macromedia Director scripts for translations (Akai Yoru, Hoshi no Sasayaki o Kike, Boku no Kareshi wa Juliet)
entry.content:
Tools

  1. arc_conv

  2. Macromedia Director

Extracting .cxt

Run build.bat to create the arc_conv.exe file in the “arc_conv” folder, then open arc_conv.exe and select the .cxt file to extract it. The scripts are the text files.

Repacking .cxt or .cst (untested)

Go to File > Import, drag the files into the “Cast” window, go to File > Save As and choose “Cast File”. In theory, repacking it just as a .cst file should work fine.

tags.tag: Akai Yoru, Hoshi no Sasayaki o Kike

entry.title: 【Tutorial】 How to extract, edit, and re-insert Gswin/Gspack engine scripts for translations (Messiah)
entry.content:
Tools

  1. GARBRO

  2. lneditor

  3. AE - VN Tools

Unpacking SCR.PAK

Use GARbro to open SCR.PAK and extract all the .scw files into a folder.

Converting the .scw files into text files

Open lneditor and go to “批量(M)”, click “批量导出TXT(E).” A new window will show up; click “使用插件” and change it to “GsWin Plugin”. Keep the encoding as “UNKNOWN”.


If done right, you’ll end up with something like this:

Re-inserting the edited text files back into .scw files

Open lneditor and go to “批量(M)” again then click “批量导入 (I)”. Keep the same settings as before.

Repacking SCR.PAK

Open AE and go to the “Archive Tool” tab and choose Datapack5/ROOT engine. Click “Create Archive” and choose the directory containing your edited .scw files.

entry.title: 【BL Game】 Melancholic Dreamtower
entry.content:
Information

Title : メランコリック・ドリィムタワー/Melancholic Dreamtower
Developer : Gintou
Play time: Medium
VNDB: v11910
Engine: Kirikiri

Description

“You’re the new hero.”

Ichiya Shinozaki opened his eyes in a strange darkness
to the words of a stranger.

“There’s a princess trapped in the highest room of this tower. I need you to get her out of this place.”

It felt like the premise of some RPG.
Ichiya was full of questions, but the stranger’s way seemed the only way.
If he wanted to get out of here, he would have to save the princess.

Ichiya wasn’t alone in his upward journey.
On the first floor was a man rendered deaf and mute.
On the second floor, a blinded man.
On the third floor, a man who coveted color.
On the fourth floor, a young girl who was terrified of men.

He undertook his so-called quest.
For the sake of the princess, for his own sake, in defiance of destiny,
steeped in the interests of five cohabitants.

5 potential suicides. 5 candidates for death.

In the overwhelming gloom of a dark pagoda.

Screenshots

entry.title: 【BL Game】 Toshoshitsu no Neversista/Library of Neversista
entry.content:
Information

Title : 図書室のネヴァジスタ/Toshoshitsu no Neversista/Library of Neversista
Developer : TARHS Entertainment
Play time: Long
VNDB: v5233
Engine: Kirikiri

Description

During a stormy summer night, a student met his death.

He left to take a picture of the rising waters in the river and never returned. All that was left of him were his belongings and the camera by the riverbank. Even after days of desperate searches, all anyone could find was one of his shoes.

In the end, he was treated as a casualty of the river…but soon other, sinister rumors of his death began to emerge. That the five friends who used to live in “The Haunted Tower” with him – one of them, some of them, all of them – may have had something to do with his cursed death.

Enter two people.

One, the student’s older brother. He receives a mysterious letter about his brother’s death, and as soon as he begins to investigate, he’s hit by a blunt object and loses consciousness.

Only to wake up again in a dark room with five students surrounding him, interrogating him, and knowing that they will never let him leave…

Two, an idealistic assistant teacher who just arrived in town. He receives a cryptic warning from an intruder in his dorm, “The Haunted Tower,” to “never think those five are children” – the poor, sad, well-behaved five students who undeservedly suffer from bad rumors.

Caught between paranoia and the desire to trust his students, one day he finds a book titled “Neversista,” which holds a startling truth…

Screenshots

entry.title: 【BL ASMR】 それでも君に首ったけ!～浮気性な恋人にお仕置き治療(わからせセックス)～
entry.content:
Information

Title : それでも君に首ったけ!～浮気性な恋人にお仕置き治療(わからせセックス)～
Developer : ハニーブーブー
Character Voice: かっぱガリ, 春真最中
Format: MP3

Description

俳優の空木遥は、専属スタイリストの都川湊と本番なしという契約の元、交際している。
しかし、空木は人肌恋しい性質で、浮気を繰り返していた。
あることをきっかけに、都川を大切にしたいという気持ちに気付いた空木は、『もう浮気はしない』と宣言。
しかし……やはり浮気癖は治らず。
再び浮気をしてしまい泣きながら謝る空木に、都川は天使のように微笑む。

大丈夫だよ、もう罪悪感で苦しまなくていいように
誰よりもオンナノコにしてあげるからね」

「え………!?」

entry.title: 【Tutorial】 How to extract, edit, and re-insert Siglus Engine scripts for translations (Tsumi naru Rasen no Ori -Whispers of Iscariot-)
entry.content:
Tools

  1. Siglus Tools

  2. SiglusExtract

  3. SiglusPatcher

Extracting Scene.pck

Open SiglusTools and select the Scene.pck file and output folder. Keep the Decryption Key on “Try to find key when working on Scene”.

Converting .ss scripts into text files or xlsx

Go to “Dump ss”, select the folder containing the extracted .ss and the output folder.

Re-inserting text files or xlsx back into .ss scripts

Go to “Pack ss” and select your original .ss folder, your edited .txt or xlsx folder, and the output folder.

Repacking Scene.pck

Go to “Pack Scene” and select the original Scene.pck file, your edited .ss folder, and the output folder.

(Optional) Siglus Engine word-wrapping with SiglusPatcher

Put the files inside SiglusPatcher.zip into your game directory, open the directory in Command Prompt and do:

Pick any version, and it should (hopefully) work.

Alternative way of unpacking and re-packing Scene.pck using SiglusExtract

Put SiglusExtract.exe and SiglusExtract.dll into your game directory, drag the exectuable into SiglusExtract.exe or double click on SiglusExtract.exe. Drag Scene.pck into the SiglusExtract.exe window to unpack. To re-pack go to “Repack Scene.pck” and select the folder with your edited .ss files and do “Do Pack!”

tags.tag: Tsumi naru Rasen no Ori -Whispers of Iscariot-

entry.title: 【BL ASMR】 俺だけ見てなきゃ許さない!～ネガティブな恋人にお仕置き治療～
entry.content:
Information

Title : 俺だけ見てなきゃ許さない!～ネガティブな恋人にお仕置き治療～
Developer : ハニーブーブー
Character Voice: かっぱガリ, 春真最中
Format: MP3

Description

中性的な美人で空木遥の専属スタイリストである都川湊は、貞操観念の低い俳優・空木遥と交際中。
二人はラブラブな生活を送っているが、都川の心中は少しほの暗い。
ノンケである彼との永遠はありえないだろうと考えていた。

そんなとき、空木が人気絶頂中の女優と手を繋いでいるところをパパラッチされてしまう!
BLドラマ主演が決まった空木は、都川の信頼を取り戻そうと必死になり、
「相手にデレデレしたりしないから!」と燃えていた。

(ノンケなんだから男にデレデレしないのは大前提だろ……)と思っていることなど彼は知らない。
それでいい。そんな馬鹿なところが可愛い。

仕事がうまくいっている姿を喜びつつ、
彼の才能を留めているんじゃないかと悩みまくる都川。能天気な空木。

しかし、あるきっかけで都川が空木との関係がいつか終わるものだと
捉えていることを知った空木は怒り心頭で……!?　

「今日は俺が湊にお仕置き治療するから!」
「…へ～～……それはそれは…」

↓

「……これに懲りたらもう悪い事するなよっ」
「…はーい……じゃあ、次は遥さんの番ですね」
「へっ?」

「遥さんさあ……本気で自分がお仕置きできる側だと思ってた?」

Download

MEGA

entry.title: 【BL ASMR】 喪服でカーセックス〜純情高校生が隠れヤリチンリーマンにおもちゃの巣窟で処女奪ってもらいました〜
entry.content:
Information

Title : 喪服でカーセックス〜純情高校生が隠れヤリチンリーマンにおもちゃの巣窟で処女奪ってもらいました〜
Developer : cyan
Character Voice: かっぱガリ
Format: MP3

Description

高校○年生のカナメは喪服フェチだ。
きっかけは5年前、親戚の葬式で帰省した夜、大好きな従兄ユウが喪服でエッチしているのを目撃したこと。

—黒く重厚で埃ひとつない美しい喪服がはだけ、月明かりに照らされた白い腕や足と生殖器ー
喪服には似つかわしくない、あの高揚した表情や、荒い吐息を目にした時、生まれて初めて性的な感情が芽生えたのだ……

従兄のユウには、カナメに隠している意外な一面があった!!
それは……実はHなことが大〜好きで、性欲がめちゃくちゃ強く!さらには玩具収集が趣味だという一面!

ある日の葬儀場で再会した2人。

「そんなに性欲が有り余ってて、経験もあって、
エッチが大好きなら、俺の処女奪って」

純情一途で喪服フェチの童貞高校生とエッチもおもちゃも大好きな隠れヤリチンリーマンによる処女卒業喪服カーセックスがここにはじまる!

Download

MEGA

entry.title: 【BL ASMR】 無気力M男22歳、アダルトショップのバイトでオーナーと後輩のおもちゃになりました。
entry.content:
Information

Title : 喪服でカーセックス〜純情高校生が隠れヤリチンリーマンにおもちゃの巣窟で処女奪ってもらいました〜
Developer : cyan
Character Voice: 乃木悠星
Format: MP3

Description

アダルトショップで働き始めて数ヶ月。

元々の面倒臭がりで、毎日セックスする日々も段々とマンネリ化してきた白桃ユウキ。
もっと刺激が欲しい…そんな時に、新たなアルバイトが入店した!

後輩の研修、サポートを任され、面倒ながらも渋々教えるユウキ。
舐め腐った態度で研修をすると、なんと後輩はとんでもない巨根&ドSだった!?

返り討ちにされへろへろになるユウキ。ショップのオーナー曰く「ドSがいたほうが接客の幅が広がる」「S加減が好みだった」とのことで呆れ返るが、久々にガン責めされて満更でもない様子で…

「無気力童貞22歳、アダルトショップでバイトしたら性に目覚めました。〜お客様は神様です〜」続編!
ドS巨根の後輩に虐められたり、オーナーと甘々Hしたり…!?

Download

MEGA

entry.title: 【BL ASMR】 妄執ストーカー三影くんのお届けです。
entry.content:
Information

Title : 妄執ストーカー三影くんのお届けです。
Developer : ハニーブーブー
Character Voice: amaoto
Format: MP3

Description

蜂巣三影は、国公立大学に通う2年生。
ミステリアスな雰囲気を放つ彼は、あまたの同級生から合コンに誘われるが、
すべて「恋人がいるから」と断っていた。

『向葵くんと付き合いだしたのは、小学校4年生のとき。
向葵くんは塾の先生で、社会を教えてくれてた。
向葵くんは格好良くて見てるだけでドキドキして……

ある日、勇気を振り絞って質問をしに行った…
そのとき、『蜂巣は勉強熱心でえらいなぁ』って頭をなでてくれて…
それから僕たちの秘密の交際は始まった。

言葉もめったに交わさないし、顔を合わせることも少ないけれど…
僕は向葵くんが今どこで何をしているかぜーんぶ知ってるから平気♪』

しかし…
ある日、三影は向葵が女を抱いている場面を盗聴してしまい…

『そうだ、二人だけの世界を作ればいいんだ♪』

歪んだ愛×歪んだ愛のハートフルエロラブコメディです♪

Download

MEGA

entry.title: 【BL ASMR】 22 Y/O Virgin Loser Learns About Sex at His New Job ~The Customer is God~ (English Subtitles)
entry.content:
Information

Title : 22 Y/O Virgin Loser Learns About Sex at His New Job ~The Customer is God~/無気力童貞22歳、アダルトショップでバイトしたら性に目覚めました。〜お客様は神様です〜
Developer : cyan
Character Voice: 乃木悠星
Format: avi

Description

Sweet deals are often too good to be true.
Lured by his friend’s promise of a “really easy job that pays a lot”, Yuuki heads to a dimly-lit store that’s located underground in the middle of the city.
Inside, the store was packed full of sex toys!
Yuuki greets the beautiful male owner, but inside he is cringing.
The job interview starts out normal enough, but then shifts to the topic of his sexual experience, and other personal matters. After he answers the questions truthfully, he is hired on the spot.
The owner then opens up a drawer and pulls out restraints and sex toys…?!
